alert.note: Alert for Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 5:27PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Teller and western El Paso Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 525 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Divide, or 22 miles northwest of Colorado Springs. This storm was nearly stationary, and was producing locally heavy rain and small hail. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Woodland Park around 530 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Divide. Since this storm is showing little motion, ponding of water and hail is likely occurring. Please use caution on local roadways where water and hail is covering the roadway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
